lal13:2: iti hi bhikṣava ātmarutaharṣamudīrayanta āgatā āsan bodhisattvasyāntaḥpuramadhyagatasya anekairdevairnāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaśakrabrahmalokapālāḥ, ye bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe autsukyamāpatsyante sma ||
lal13:3: tatra bhikṣavo apareṇa samayena saṁbahulānāṁ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaśakrabrahmalokapālānāmetadabhavat—aticiraṁ batāyaṁ satpuruṣo ’ntaḥpure vilambitaḥ | ye cāsyeme dīrgharātraṁ paripācitāḥ sattvāścaturbhiḥ saṁgrahavastubhirdānena priyavākyenārthakriyayā samānārthatayā, yasya bodhiprāptasya dharmadeśitamājñāsyanti, tatsahaiva ca tāni dharmabhājanāni sarvāṇyantarhitāni bhaviṣyanti | bodhisattvaśca paścādabhiniṣkramyānuttarāṁ samyaksaṁbodhimabhisaṁbhotsyate ||
lal13:4: tataste sagauravāḥ sapratīkṣāḥ prāñjalībhūtā bodhisattvaṁ namasyanti sma | evamabhiprāyāścodīkṣamāṇāḥ sthitā abhūvan—kadā ca nāma tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṁ varapravaraṁ śuddhasattvamabhiniṣkrāmantaṁ paśyema, abhiniṣkramya ca tasmin mahādrumarājamūle ’bhiniṣadya sabalaṁ māraṁ dharṣayitvā anuttarāṁ samyaksaṁbodhimabhisaṁbuddhaṁ daśabhistathāgatabalaiḥ samanvāgataṁ caturbhiśca tathāgatavaiśāradyaiḥ samanvāgatamaṣṭādaśabhiścāveṇikairbuddhadharmaiḥ samanvāgataṁ triparivartaṁ dvādaśākāramanuttaraṁ dharmacakraṁ pravartayantaṁ mahatā buddhavikrīḍitena sadevamānuṣāsuralokaṁ yathādhimuktyā subhāṣitena saṁtoṣayantamiti ||
lal13:5: tatra bhikṣavo bodhisattvo dīrgharātramasaṁkhyeyān kalpānupādāya satataṁ samitamaparapraṇeyo ’bhūt | sarvalaukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu svayamevācāryaḥ sarvakuśalamūladharmacaryāsu dīrghakālaṁ ca kālajño velājñaḥ samayajño ’bhūdacyuto ’bhijñaḥ pañcābhijñābhiḥ samanvāgato ’bhūt | ṛddhipādavikrīḍataḥ sarvendriyakuśalaḥ kālākālajñaḥ kālaveṣī mahāsāgara iva prāptāṁ velāṁ nātikrāmati sma | so ’bhijñajñānabalena samanvāgataḥ svayameva sarvaṁ jānāti sma | asyāyaṁ kālaḥ pragrahasya, ayaṁ kālo nigrahasya, ayaṁ kālaḥ saṁgrahasya, ayaṁ kālo ’nugrahasya, ayaṁ kāla upekṣāyāḥ, ayaṁ kālo bhāṣitasya, ayaṁ kālastūṣṇīṁbhāvasya, ayaṁ kālo niṣkramyasya, ayaṁ kālaḥ pravrajyāyāḥ, ayaṁ kālaḥ svādhyāyasya, ayaṁ kālo yoniśomanaskārasya, ayaṁ kālaḥ pravivekasya, ayaṁ kālaḥ kṣatriyaparṣadamupasaṁkramituṁ…peyālaṁ…yāvadayaṁ kālo brāhmaṇagṛhapatiparṣadamupasaṁkramitum, ayaṁ kālo devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaśakrabrahmalokapālabhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāparṣadamupasaṁkramitum, ayaṁ kālo dharmadeśanāyāḥ, ayaṁ kālaḥ pratisaṁlayanasya | sarvatra bodhisattvo nityakālaṁ kālajño bhavati sma kālaveṣī ||
lal13:6: atha ca punarbhikṣavo dharmatāpratilambha eṣa ca caramabhāvikānāṁ bodhisattvānāṁ yadavaśyaṁ daśadiglokadhātusthitairbuddhairbhagavadbhirantaḥpuramadhyagatāḥ saṁgītitūryanirnāditairebhirevaṁrūpairdharmamukhaiḥ saṁcoditavyā bhavanti ||
lal13:8: ye sattvāgrā daśadigloke teṣu viśeṣāttatra ratituriyaiḥ |
lal13:9: gāthā gītā ima ratimadhurā saṁcodentī naravarapravaram ||
lal13:10: pūrvi tubhyaṁ ayu kṛtu praṇidhī dṛṣṭvā sattvān duḥkhaśatabharitān |
lal13:11: lenaṁ trāṇaṁ jaganijaśaraṇe bheṣye nāthu hitakaru paramaḥ ||
lal13:12: sādho vīrā smara cari purimāṁ yā te āsījjagahitapraṇidhiḥ |
lal13:13: kālo velā ayu tava samayo niṣkramyāhī ṛṣivarapravarā ||
lal13:14: yasyārthe te dhanavara vividhā tyaktā pūrve śirakaracaraṇā |
lal13:16: tvaṁ śīlena vratatapacaritaḥ tvaṁ kṣāntīye jagahitakaraṇaḥ |
lal13:17: tvaṁ vīryeṇā śubhaguṇanicito dhyāne prajñe na tu samu tribhave ||
lal13:18: krodhāviṣṭā khilamalabahulā te maitrīye tvayi sphuṭa sugatā |
lal13:21: obhāsesī daśa ima diśato meghā muktaḥ śaśiriva vimalaḥ ||
lal13:22: ete cānye bahuvidha rucirā tūryairghoṣāṁ jinarutaravanā |
lal13:23: ye codentī suranaramahitaṁ niṣkramyāhī ayu tava samayu ||
lal13:25: bodhisattvasya khalu punarbhikṣavastasmin gṛhavarapradhāne sarvopakaraṇasamṛddhisamudite yathābhiprāyasukhavihārānukūle amarapurabhavanaprakāśe vitardiniryūhatoraṇagavākṣaharmyakūṭāgāraprāsādavarapravare sarvaratnavicitrālaṁkāravividhabhaktisuvibhakte ucchritachatradhvajapatākānekaratnakiṅkiṇījālasamalaṁkṛte anekapaṭṭhadāmaśatasahasrābhipralambite nānāratnapratyupte muktāhārābhipralambite vicitrapaṭṭaratnasaṁkramopaśobhite avasaktapaṭṭamālyadāmakalāpe gandhaghaṭikānirdhūpite avaśyāyapaṭavitatavitānesarvartukapuṣpaparamasugandhisurucirābhiprakīrṇapuṣkariṇīpuṇḍarīkanavanalinījāla—saṁsthānaparibhogabahule patraguptaśukasārikakokilahaṁsamayūracakravākakunālakalaviṅkajīvajīvakādinānāvidhadvijagaṇamadhura svaranikūjitenīlavaiḍūryamaye dharaṇītalasaṁsthānaparibhoge sarvarūpapratibhāsasaṁdarśane atṛptanayanābhiramye  paramaprītiprāmodyasaṁjanane tasmin gṛhavarapradhāne ’dhyāvasato bodhisattvasyodāravaraśaraṇabhavananivāsino ’malavimalanirmalāṅgasyāmuktamālyābharaṇasya pravarasurabhigandhānulepanānuliptagātrasya śuklaśubhavimalaviśuddhanirmalavastraprāvṛtaśarīrasya anekadivyadūṣyasūkṣmasuvinyastamṛdukācilindikasukhasaṁsparśavarāṅgaracitaśayanatalābhirūḍhasya amaravadhūbhiriva sarvato anavadyāpratikūladarśanaśubhopacāracaritasya abhirūpāntaḥpuramadhyagatasya śaṅkhabherīmṛdaṅgapaṇavatuṇavavīṇāvallakisaṁpatāḍakipalanakulasughoṣakamadhuraveṇunirnāditaghoṣarutanānātūryasaṁgītisaṁprayogapratibodhitasya ye ca nārīgaṇāḥ snigdhamadhuramanojñasvaraveṇunirnāditanirghoṣarutena bodhisattvaṁ pratisaṁbodhayanti sma, teṣāṁ daśadigavasthitānāṁ buddhānāṁ bhagavatāmadhisthānena tebhyo veṇutūryaninādanirghoṣarutebhya imā bodhisattvasya saṁcodanā gāthā niścaranti sma—
lal13:26: yā nāryo muditamanāḥ prasannacittā veṇubhyo madhuramanoramaṁ raṇante |
lal13:28: pūrve te ayu (kṛtu) praṇidhī abhūṣi vīrā dṛṣṭvemāṁ janata sadā anāthabhūtām |
lal13:29: śociṣye jaramaraṇāttathānyaduḥkhād buddhitvā padamajaraṁ paraṁ aśokam ||
lal13:30: tatsādho puravara ita śīghraṁ niṣkramyā purimaṛṣibhi cīrṇam |
lal13:32: pūrve te dhanaratana vicitrā tyaktābhūt karacaraṇapriyātmā |
lal13:33: eṣo ’dyā tava samayu maharṣe dharmaughaṁ jagi vibhaja anantam ||
lal13:34: śīlaṁ te śubha vimalakhaṇḍaṁ pūrvānte vara satatamabhūṣī |
lal13:36: kṣāntīye bhava śatacaritastvaṁ kṣāntāste jagi vividha duruktāḥ |
lal13:37: kṣāntāye kṣamadamaniratātma naiṣkramye mati kuru dvipadendrā ||
lal13:38: vīryaṁ te dṛḍhamacalamakampyaṁ pūrvānte pṛthu sugata abhūvan |
lal13:39: dharṣitvā namuci śaṭhaṁ sasainyaṁ śoṣiṣye traya sakalaapāyāt ||
lal13:41: tvaṁ varṣā amṛtajalamoghaṁ tarpehī ciratṛṣita anāthāṁ ||
lal13:42: tāṁ pūrvāṁ giravaramanucintyā niṣkramyā puravara ita śīghram |
lal13:44: prajñāyā paricarikuśala tvaṁ jñānaṁ te pṛthu vipulamanantam |
lal13:45: mūḍhānāṁ vimatipathasthitānāṁ prajñābhāṁ śubharucira kuru tvam ||
lal13:46: maitrāyāṁ bhava śatacaritastvaṁ kārūṇye vara mudita upekṣe |
lal13:47: yāmevā varacari caritastvaṁ tāmevā cariṁ vibhaja jagasya ||
lal13:48: evaṁ daśa diśa jinatejairgāthā vai guṇakusumavicitrāḥ |
lal13:50: yada puna pramudita ratikara pramadā surucira sumadhura prabhaṇiṣu turiyaiḥ |
lal13:51: atha jina daśadiśi suranaradamakāḥ giravaramanuravi tatu ravi turiyaiḥ ||
lal13:52: kṛta tvayi hitakara bahuguṇa janato nijinitu nijaguṇa vicarati gatiṣū |
lal13:53: smara smara purimaka bratatapacaraṇa laghu vraja drumavaru spṛśa padamamṛtam ||
lal13:54: sutṛṣita naramaru jinaguṇarahitā tvayi mati pratibalu amṛtarasadadā |
lal13:55: daśabalaguṇadhara budhajanamahitaṁ laghu tvayi narapati vibhajahi amṛtam ||
lal13:56: tyaji tvayi puri bhavi dhanamaṇikanakā sakhi priya suta mahi sanagaranigamā |
lal13:57: śiramapi tyaji svaku karacaranayanā jagati ya hitakaru jinaguṇaniratā ||
lal13:58: puri tuma naravarasutu nṛpu yadabhū naru tava abhimukha ima giramavacī |
lal13:59: dada mama ima mahi sanagaranigamāṁ tyaji tada pramuditu na ca manu kṣubhito ||
lal13:60: puri tuma narapati svaku dvija yadabhū gurujani paricari na ca druhi parato |
lal13:61: sthapayisu dvijavara bahujana kuśale cyutu tatu bhavagatu marupuranilayam ||
lal13:62: puri tuma nṛpasuta ṛṣivaru yadabhū chini tava tanuruha kalinṛpu ruṣito |
lal13:63: kṛta tvayi kulakriya na ca manu kṣubhito payu tava sravi tada karatalacaraṇaiḥ ||
lal13:64: syamu puna ṛṣisuta tvayi puri yadabhū vrataratu gurubharu girivaranilaye |
lal13:65: hata bhava nṛpatina viṣakṛta īṣuṇā kṛpa tava tahi nṛpa na ca manu kṣubhito ||
lal13:66: puri tuma guṇadhara mṛgapati yadabhū girinadibahujali duyamanu puruṣo |
lal13:67: hita bhava tvayi naru sthalapathi sthapito upanayi tava ari na ca manu kṣubhito ||
lal13:68: puri tuma naravara tyaji sutu yadabhū maṇi tava prapatitu jaladhari vipule |
lal13:69: cyavayitu kṣapayitu tvaya mahaudadhiṁ labhi tada dhanamaṇi dṛḍhabala vaṣabhī ||
lal13:70: puri tuma supuruṣa ṛṣivaru yadabhū dvija tava upagatu bhava mama śaraṇam |
lal13:71: bhaṇi ṛṣi dvijavara mama ripuupane tyaji tvaya svaki tanu na ca dvija tyajase ||
lal13:72: syamu ṛṣi upagatu puri drumanilaye ruci bhaṇi taruruha kati ima gaṇaye |
lal13:73: suvidita sugaṇita yatha tahi kiśalā tatha tava avitatha samagira racitā ||
lal13:74: sukula suguṇadhara puri drumi vasato kṣayagatu na ca tyaji kṛtu smari purimam |
lal13:75: marupati pramuditu tava guṇa smarato śriyakari drumavari yathariva purimā ||
lal13:76: iti tava asadṛśa vratatapacaraṇā bahuguṇa guṇadhara guṇapathi carato |
lal13:77: tyaji mahi sanagari ayu tava samayo laghu jagu sthapayahi jinaguṇacaraṇe ||
lal13:78: yada pramadaratanā śubhavastrā bhūṣitagātrā varapravaru turiyā sumanojñā saṁprabhaṇīṣu |
lal13:79: atha daśasū diśato jinatejairgātha vicitrā iti raviṣū madhurā rutaghoṣā tūryasvarebhyaḥ ||
lal13:82: smara purimapraṇidhiṁ narasiṁhā yā ti abhūṣī
lal13:87: tvayi tyajitaṁ na ca te khiladoṣā yācanakeṣu ||
lal13:88: śiśunṛpati tvamihā śaśiketo āsi sudaṁṣṭro kṛpa karuṇāmanaso maṇicūḍo candrapradīpaḥ |
lal13:89: iti pramukhā kariyā dṛḍhaśūro rājasunetro bahu nṛpati nayutā rata dāne tvaṁ savikurvan ||
lal13:90: tava sugatā carito bahukalpāṁ śīlacarīye maṇiratnā vimalā sadṛśābhūcchīlaviśuddhiḥ |
lal13:91: tvayi caratā camarī yatha bālaṁ rakṣitu śīlaṁ kṛtu tvamihā jagati vipulārthaṁ śīlaratenā ||
lal13:92: gajavaru tvamihā ripulubdhe viddhu iṣūṇā kṛpa karuṇā janiyā atiraudre chāditu śobhe |
lal13:93: parityaji te rucirā śubhadantā na ca tyaji śīlaṁ iti pramukhā kariyā bahu tubhyaṁ śīlavikurvī ||
lal13:94: tvayi sahitā jagato ’hita anekā duḥkhasahasrā bahukaṭukāvacanaṁ vadhabandhā kṣāntiratenā |
lal13:95: paricārita purime nara ye te sarvasukhenā puna vadhakāstava teha abhūvan tacca ti kṣāntam ||
lal13:97: himakiraṇā salilā bhayabhītaṁ tvaṁ naru gṛhya |
lal13:99: laghu vadhakāṁ sa tavā upanetrī taṁ ca ti kṣāntam ||
lal13:106: vyasanagata manujāṁ tada gṛhyā kṣemi thapesī
lal13:107: iti pramukhā kariyā bahu tubhyaṁ vīryavikurvā ||
lal13:109: laghu capalaṁ viṣayai ratilolaṁ cittu damitvā |
lal13:112: tvaṁ purime ṛṣi susthitu āsī dhyānaratīye nṛparahitā manujā tvamu gṛhyā rājyabhiṣiñcī |
lal13:113: daśakuśalī janitā thapitā te brahmapatheṣu cyuta manujā vrajiṣū tada sarve brahmaniketam ||
lal13:114: diśividiśi vividhāgatijñāne tvaṁ suvidhijño paracaritā jagati rutajñāne indriyajñāne |
lal13:115: nayavinaye vividhāmatidhāre pāragatastvaṁ ayu samayo tvamihā nṛpasūno niṣkramaṇāya ||
lal13:116: tvayi purimā janatā ima dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭivipannā jaramaraṇā vividhā bahuduḥkhe kṛchragatā hi |
lal13:117: bhavavibhavaṁkaraṇo ṛjumārge svāmanubaddhā hatatamasa tvamihā kṛtu loke arthu mahanto ||
lal13:118: iti vividhā rucirā guṇayuktā gātha vicitrā
lal13:119: tatu raviṣu turiyebhī jinatejā codayi vīram |
lal13:123: prabodhayanti ye ’grasattva tūryasaṁpravāditaiḥ jinānubhāvi ekarūpa gātha tūrya niścarī ||
lal13:124: yasyārthi tubhya kalpa naika tyaktu tyāga dustyajā
lal13:125: sucīrṇa śīlu kṣānti vīrya dhyāna prajña bhāvitā |
lal13:126: jagaddhitārtha so ti kālu sāṁprataṁ upasthito
lal13:128: tyuktu pūrvi ratnakośa svarṇarūpyabhūṣaṇā yaṣṭā ti yajña naikarūpa tāsu tāsu jātiṣu |
lal13:129: tyakta bhārya putra dhīta kāyu rājyu jīvitaṁ bodhiheturaprameya tyaktuḥdustyajā tvayā ||
lal13:135: mahatyāgavantu sthāmavantu yaḥ kṛtajña tvaṁ abhūḥ |
lal13:137: subhāṣitaṁgaveṣi rāji asi sumatiṁ ca sūrato ||
lal13:138: candraprabho viśeṣagāmi reṇubhū diśāṁpati pradānaśūra kāśirāju ratnacūḍa śāntagaḥ |
lal13:139: eti cānyi pārthivendra yebhi tyakta dustyajā yathā ti vṛṣṭa tyāgavṛṣṭi eṣa dharma varṣahī ||
lal13:140: dṛṣṭā ti pūrviṁ sattvasāra gaṅgavālukopamā kṛtā ti teṣa buddhapūja aprameyacintiyā |
lal13:141: varāgrabodhi eṣamāṇa sattvamokṣakāraṇādū ayaṁ sa kālu prāptu sūru niṣkramā purottamāt ||
lal13:142: prathamena te amoghadarśi śālapuṣpapūjito virocanaḥ prasannacitta prekṣitaḥ kṣaṇāntaram |
lal13:143: harītakī ca eka datta dundubhisvarāya te tṛṇottha gṛhya dhāritā ti dṛṣṭa candanaṁ gṛham ||
lal13:144: purapraveśi reṇu dṛṣṭa kṣiptu cūrṇamuṣṭikā dharmeśvarāya sādhukāru dattu dharma bhāṣato |
lal13:145: namo namaḥ samantadarśi dṛṣṭa vāca bhāṣitā mahārciskandhi svarṇamāla kṣipta harṣitena te ||
lal13:146: dharmadhvajo daśāpradāni rodhu muṅga muṣṭinā aśokapuṣpi jñānaketu yvāgupāna sārathiḥ |
lal13:147: ratnaśikhī ca dīpadāni padmayoni oṣadhī sarvābhibhūśca muktahāri padmadāni sāgaro ||
lal13:148: vitānadāni padmagarbhi siṁhu varṣasaṁstare śālendrarāja sarpidāni kṣīratyāgi puṣpitī |
lal13:149: yaśodattu kuruṇṭapuṣpi satyadarśi bhojane kāyu praṇāmi jñānameru nāgadattu cīvare ||
lal13:150: atyuccagāmi candanāgri tīkṣṇalohamuṣṭinā mahāviyūha padmadāni raśmirāja ratnabhiḥ |
lal13:151: śākyamuni ca suvarṇamuṣṭi indraketu saṁstuto sūryānano vataṁsake hi svarṇapaṭṭi sūmatī ||
lal13:152: nāgābhibhū maṇipradāni puṣya dūṣyasaṁstare bhaiṣajyarāju ratnachatri siṁhaketu āsane |
lal13:153: guṇāgradhāri ratnajāli sarvavādi kāśyapo gandhāgri cūrṇi mukta arciketu puṣpacaityake ||
lal13:154: akṣobhyarāja kūṭāgāri mālya lokapūjito tagaraśikhi ca rājyatyāgi sarvagandhi durjayo |
lal13:155: mahāpradīpa ātmatyāgi bhūṣaṇe padmottaro vicitrapuṣpi dharmaketu dīpakāri utpalaiḥ ||
lal13:156: eti cānyi sattvasāra ye ti pūrva pūjitā nānārūpa vicitra pūja anyajanyakurvatā |
lal13:157: smarāhi te atīta buddha tā ca pūja śāstunāṁ anāthasattva śokapūrṇa mā upekṣi niṣkramā ||
lal13:158: dīpaṁkareti dṛṣṭamātri labdha kṣānti uttamā abhijña pañca acyutā ti labdha ānulomikā |
lal13:159: atottareṇa ekameka buddha pūjacintiyā pravartitā asaṁkhyakalpa sarvalokadhātuṣū ||
lal13:160: kṣīṇā ti kalpa aprameya te ca buddha nirvṛtā tavāpi sarva ātmabhāvi te ca nāma kva gatā |
lal13:161: kṣayāntadharmi sarvi bhāvu nāsti nityu saṁskṛte anitya kāma rājyabhoga niṣkramā purottamāt ||
lal13:162: jarā ca vyādhi mṛtyu enti dāruṇā mahābhayā
lal13:164: kṣayāntadharmi sarvi bhāvu nāsti nityu saṁskṛte
lal13:167: sukhaśayanagataṁ manujādhipatiṁ tada tūryaravo ayu niścarate ||
lal13:169: bhavani śaraṇe sada mūḍha jagat bhramatī bhramaro yatha kumbhagato ||
lal13:170: adhruvaṁ tribhavaṁ śaradabhranibhaṁ naṭaraṅgasamā jagi rūrmicutī |
lal13:171: girinadyasamaṁ laghuśīghrajavaṁ vrajatāyu jage yatha vidyu nabhe ||
lal13:173: parivartiṣu pañcagatiṣvabudhāḥ yatha kumbhakarasya hi cakrabhramī ||
lal13:175: pariṣiktamidaṁ kalipāśa jagat mṛgalubdhakapāśi yathaiva kapi ||
lal13:176: sabhayā saraṇāḥ sada vairakarāḥ bahuśoka upadrava kāmaguṇāḥ |
lal13:179: bhavatṛṣṇalatāya vivṛddhikarāḥ sabhayā saraṇā sada kāmaguṇāḥ ||
lal13:180: yatha agnikhadā jvalitā sabhayā tatha kāma ime viditāryajanaḥ |
lal13:181: mahapaṅkasamā asisundhusamāḥ madhudigdha iva kṣuradhāra yathā ||
lal13:182: yatha sarpisaro yatha mīḍhaghaṭāḥ tatha kāma ime viditā viduṣām |
lal13:183: tatha śūlasamā dvijapeśisamāḥ yatha śvāna karaṅka savairamukhāḥ ||
lal13:184: udacandrasamā imi kāmaguṇāḥ pratibimba iva girighoṣa yathā |
lal13:186: kṣaṇikā vaśikā imi kāmaguṇāḥ tatha māyamarīcisamā alikāḥ |
lal13:188: prathame vayase vararūpadharaḥ priya iṣṭa mato iya bālacarī |
lal13:189: jaravyādhidukhai hatatejavapuṁ vijahanti mṛgā iva śuṣkanadīm ||
lal13:190: dhanadhānyavaro bahudravyabalī priya iṣṭa mato iya bālacarī |
lal13:191: parihīnadhanaṁ puna kṛcchragataṁ vijahanti narā iva śūnyaṭavīm ||
lal13:192: yatha puṣpadrumo saphaleva drumo naru dānaratastatha prītikaro |
lal13:193: dhanahīna jarārtitu yācanako bhavate tada apriyu gṛdhrasamaḥ ||
lal13:195: jaravyādhidukhārditu kṣīṇadhano bhavate tada apriyu mṛtyusamaḥ ||
lal13:196: jarayā jaritaḥ samatītavayo druma vidyuhateva yathā bhavati |
lal13:197: jarajīrṇa agāru yathā sabhayo jaraniḥsaraṇaṁ laghu brūhi mune ||
lal13:198: jara śoṣayate naranārigaṇaṁ yatha mālulatā ghanaśālavanam |
lal13:199: jara vīryaparākramavegaharī jara paṅkanimagna yathā puruṣo ||
lal13:201: sada saukhyaharī paribhāvakarī jara mṛtyukarī jara ojaharī ||
lal13:203: jaravyādhigataṁ prasamīkṣva jagat dukhaniḥsaraṇaṁ laghu deśayahī ||
lal13:204: śiśire hi yathā himadhātu mahān tṛṇagulmavanauṣadhiojaharo |
lal13:205: tatha ojaharo ahu vyādhijaro parihīyati indriya rūpa balam ||
lal13:207: pratighātakaraḥ priyu dveṣakaraḥ paridāhakaro yatha sūrya nabhe ||
lal13:208: maraṇaṁ cavanaṁ cuti kālakriyā priyadravyajanena viyogu sadā |
lal13:209: apunāgamanaṁ ca asaṁgamanaṁ drumapatraphalā nadisrota yathā ||
lal13:210: maraṇaṁ vaśitāmavaśīkurute maraṇaṁ harate nadi dāru yathā |
lal13:212: maraṇo grasate bahuprāṇiśataṁ makareva jalā hari bhūtagaṇam |
lal13:213: garuḍo uragaṁ mṛgarāju gajaṁ jvalaneva tṛṇoṣadhibhūtagaṇam ||
lal13:214: ima īdṛśakai bahudoṣaśataiḥ jagu mocayituṁ kṛta yā praṇidhi |
lal13:215: smara tāṁ purimāṁ praṇidhānacarīṁ ayu kālu tavā abhiniṣkramitum ||
lal13:217: tada gātha vicitra niścarī tūryaśabdāt sugatānubhāvataḥ ||
lal13:218: laghu tadbhañjati sarvasaṁskṛtaṁ acirasthāyi nabheva vidyataḥ |
lal13:219: ayu kālu tavā upasthitaḥ samayo niṣkramaṇāya suvrata ||
lal13:222: saṁskāra pralopadharmime varṣakāli calitaṁ ca lepanam |
lal13:228: hetūbhi ca pratyayebhi cā sarvasaṁskāragataṁ pravartate |
lal13:229: anyonya pratītya hetutaḥ tadidaṁ bālajano na budhyate ||
lal13:230: yatha muñja pratītya balvajaṁ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā |
lal13:231: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate eṣa ekaikaśa nāsti vartanā ||
lal13:234: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro |
lal13:235: na ca tato na caiva tat evamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā ||
lal13:236: saṁskāra avidyapratyayāḥ te saṁskāre na santi tattvataḥ |
lal13:237: saṁskāra avidya caiva hi śūnya eke prakṛtīnirīhakāḥ ||
lal13:239: na ca tatra na caiva śāśvato eva saṁskārānucchedaśāśvatāḥ ||
lal13:241: na ca cakṣuṣi rūpa niśrita rūpasaṁkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi ||
lal13:245: akahiṁ ca gataṁ anāgataṁ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati ||
lal13:246: araṇiṁ yatha cottarāraṇiṁ hastavyāyāma trayebhi saṁgati |
lal13:247: iti pratyayato ’gni jāyate jātu kṛtārthu laghu nirudhyate ||
lal13:248: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kutayaṁ āgatu kutra yāti vā |
lal13:249: vidiśo diśi sarvi mārgato nāgati nāsya gatiśca labhyate ||
lal13:250: skandhadhātvāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayā |
lal13:251: sāmagri tu sattvasūcanā sa ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate ||
lal13:253: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tāluke akṣaraikaika tu nopalabhyate ||
lal13:257: kṣaṇikāṁ vaśikāṁ tadā dṛśī sarvā vāca pratiśrutakopamām ||
lal13:258: yatha tantri pratītya dārū ca hastavyāyāma trayebhi saṁgati |
lal13:260: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kutayaṁ āgatu kutra yāti vā |
lal13:261: vidiśo diśi sarvi mārgataḥ śabdagamanāgamanaṁ na labhyate ||
lal13:262: tatha hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarvasaṁskāragataṁ pravartate |
lal13:263: yogī puna bhūtadaśanāt śūnya saṁskāra nirīha paśyati ||
lal13:264: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ śūnya adhyātmika śūnya bāhyakāḥ |
lal13:266: iya īdṛśa dharmalakṣaṇā buddha dīpaṁkara darśane tvayā |
lal13:267: anubuddha svayaṁ yathātmanā tatha bodhehi sadevamānuṣāṁ ||
lal13:270: tvayi yasya kṛtena paṇḍitā dattu dānaṁ bahukalpakoṭiṣu |
lal13:271: saṁprāpya hi bodhimuttamāṁ āryadhanasaṁgraha kariṣya prāṇinām ||
lal13:272: tāṁ pūrvacarīmanusmarā nārya dhanahīna daridra duḥkhitām |
lal13:273: mā upekṣahi sattvasārathe āryadhanasaṁgrahi teṣu kurvahi ||
lal13:274: tvayi śīla sadā surakṣitaṁ pithanārthāya apāyabhūminām |
lal13:276: tāṁ pūrvacarīmanusmarā baddhvā dvāra nirayāya bhūminām |
lal13:278: tvayi kṣānti sadā surakṣitā pratighakrodhaśamārtha dehinām |
lal13:279: bhāvārṇava sattva tāriyā sthāpayiṣye śivi kṣemi nirjvale ||
lal13:281: mā upekṣa vihiṁsacāriṇaḥ kṣāntibhūmīya sthape imaṁ jagat ||
lal13:282: tvayi vīrya yadartha sevitaṁ dharmanāvaṁ samudānayitvanā |
lal13:283: uttārya jagadbhavārṇavāt thapayiṣye śivi kṣemi nirjvale ||
lal13:285: laghu vīryabalaṁ parākramā sattva saṁtārayahī anāyakāṁ ||
lal13:286: tvaya dhyānakileśadhyeṣaṇā bhāvitā yasya kṛtena sūratā |
lal13:289: mā upekṣahi kleśupadrutāṁ dhyānaikāgri sthapehimāṁ prajām ||
lal13:290: tvayi prajña purā subhāvitā mohavidyāndhatamovṛte jage |
lal13:293: dadahī varaprajña suprabhā dharmacakṣuṁ vimalaṁ nirañjanam ||
lal13:295: yaṁ śrutva middhaṁ vivarjiyā cittu preṣeti varāgrabodhaye ||
lal13:297: iti hi bhikṣavo ’ntaḥpuramadhyagato bodhisattvo ’virahito ’bhūddharmaśravaṇena, avirahito ’bhūddharmamanasikāreṇa | takasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo dīrgharātraṁ sagauravo ’bhūt | dharmeṣu dharmabhāṇakeṣu cādhyāśayena dharmārthiko dharmakāmo dharmaratirato ’bhūt | dharmaparyeṣṭyatṛpto yathāśrutadharmasaṁprakāśakaḥ, anuttaro mahādharmadānapatiḥ, nirāmiṣadharmadeśako dharmadānenāmatsaraḥ, ācāryamuṣṭivigato dharmānudharmapratipanno dharmapratipattiśūraḥ, dharmalayano dharmatrāṇo dharmaśaraṇo dharmapratiśaraṇo dharmaparāyaṇaḥ dharmanidhyāptiḥ kṣāntiniryātaḥ prajñāpāramitācarita upāyakauśalyagatiṁ gataḥ ||
lal13:298: tatra bhikṣavo bodhisattvo mahopāyakauśalyavikrīḍitena sarvāntaḥpurasya yathādhimuktyā īryāpathamupadarśya, paurvikāṇāṁ ca bodhisattvānāṁ lokaviṣayasamatikrāntānāṁ lokānuvartanakriyādharmatāmanuvartya, dīrgharātraṁ suviditakāmadoṣaḥ sattvaparipākavaśādakāmātkāmopabhogaṁ saṁdarśya, aparimitakuśalamūlopacayapuṇyasaṁbhārabalaviśeṣaṇāsadṛśīṁ lokādhipateyatāṁ saṁdarśya, devamanuṣyātikrāntaṁ sārodāravividhavicitrarūpaśabdagandharasasparśaparamaratiramaṇīyaṁ kāmaratirasaukhyamupadarśya, sarvakāmaratisvaviṣayeṣvaparyantatvāt svacittavaśavartitāṁ saṁdarśya, pūrvapraṇidhānabalasahāyakuśalamūlopacitān sattvān samānasaṁvāsatayā paripācya, sarvalokasaṁkleśamalāsaṁkliṣṭacittatayāntaḥpuramadhyagato yathābhinimantritasya sattvadhātoḥ paripākakālamavekṣamāṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā bodhisattvastasmin samaye pūrvapratijñāmanusmarati sma, buddhadharmāṁścāmukhīkaroti sma, praṇidhānabalaṁ cābhinirharati sma | sattveṣu ca mahākaruṇāmavakrāmati sma | sattvapramokṣaṁ ca cintayati sma | sarvasaṁpado vipattiparyavasānā iti pratyavekṣate sma | anekopadravabhayabahulaṁ ca saṁsāramupaparīkṣate  sma | mārakalipāśāṁśca saṁchinatti sma | saṁsāraprabandhāccātmānamuccārayati sma | nirvāṇe ca cittaṁ saṁpreṣayati sma ||
lal13:299: tatra bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ pūrvāntata eva suviditasaṁsāradoṣaḥ saṁskṛtenādhyāśayenānarthikaḥ sarvopādānaparigrahairanarthiko buddhadharmanirvāṇābhimukhaḥ saṁsāraparāṅmukhastathāgatagocarābhirataḥ māraviṣayagocarāsaṁsṛṣṭaḥ ādīptabhavadoṣadarśī traidhātukānniḥśaraṇābhiprāyaḥ saṁsāradoṣādīnavaniḥsaraṇakuśalaḥ pravrajyābhilāṣī niṣkramaṇābhiprāyo vivekanimno vivekapravaṇo vivekaprāgbhāraḥ āraṇyaprāraṇyābhimukhaḥ pravivekapraśamābhikāṅkṣī ātmaparahitapratipannaḥ anuttarapratipattiśūro lokasyārthakāmo hitakāmaḥ sukhakāmo yogakṣemakāmo lokānukampako hitaiṣī maitrīvihārī mahākāruṇikaḥ saṁgrahavastukuśalaḥ satatasamitamaparikhinnamānasaḥ sattvaparipākavinayakuśalaḥ sarvasattveṣvekaputrakapremānugatamanasikāraḥ sarvavastunirapekṣaparityāgī dānasaṁvibhāgarataḥ prayuktatyāgaḥ prayatapāṇiḥ tyāgaśūro yaṣṭayajñaḥ susamṛddhapuṇyaḥ susaṁgṛhītapuṇyaḥ pariṣkāravigatamalāmātsaryasunigṛhītacitto ’nuttaro mahādānapatirdattvā ca vipākāpratikāṅkṣī pradānaśūraḥ icchāmahecchālobhadveṣamadamānamohamātsaryapramukhasarvārikleśagaṇapratyarthikanigrahāyābhyutthitaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādaprabandhāccalitaḥ mahātyāgacittasaṁnāhasusaṁnaddhaḥ lokānukampako hitaiṣīva varmitakavacitavīryaḥ sattvapramokṣālambanamahākaruṇābalavikramaparākramaḥ avaivartikasarvasattvasamacittatyāgapraharaṇo yathābhiprāyasattvāśayasaṁtoṣaṇo bodhibhājanībhūtaḥ kālākṣuṇṇadharmavedhī bodhipariṇāmapraṇidhiḥ anavanāmitadhvajastrimaṇḍalapariśodhanadānaparityāgī jñānavaravajradṛḍhapraharaṇaḥ sunigṛhītakleśapratyarthikaḥ śīlaguṇacāritrapratipannaḥ svārakṣitakāyavāṅbhanaskarmānto ’ṇumātrāvadyabhayadarśī supariśuddhaśīlaḥ amalavimalanirmalacittaḥ sarvaduruktadurāgatavacanapathākrośaparibhāṣaṇakutsanatāḍanatarjanavadhabandhanāvarodhanaparikleśāluḍitacitto ’kṣubhitacittaḥ kṣāntisaurabhyasaṁpannaḥ akṣato ’nupahato ’vyāpannacittaḥ sarvasattvahitārthāyottaptavīryārambhī dṛḍhasamādānasarvakuśalamūladharmasamudānayanāpratyudāvartyasmṛtimān susaṁprajñāsusamāhito ’vikṣiptacitto dhyānaikāgramanasikāro dharmapravicayakuśalo labdhāloko vigatatamondhakāraḥ anityaduḥkhātmāśubhākāraparibhāvitacetāḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇaṛddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgārya satyasarvabodhipakṣadharmasuparikarmakṛtamanasikāraḥ śamathavipaśyanāsuparyavadātabuddhiḥ pratītyasamutpādasatyadarśī satyānubodhādaparapratyayastrivimokṣasukhavikrīḍito māyāmarīcisvapnodakacandrapratiśrutkāpratibhāsopamasarvadharmanayāvatīrṇaḥ ||
lal13:300: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaivaṁ bhavati pratikṛtiḥ—evaṁ dharmavihārī evaṁ guṇamāhātmyavihārī evaṁ sattvārthābhiyuktavihārī abhūt | bhūyasyā mātrayā ābhirdaśadigbuddhādhiṣṭhānatūryasaṁgītiviniḥsṛtābhirgāthābhiḥ saṁcoditaḥ sa tasyāṁ velāyāṁ pūrveṣāṁ ca bodhisattvānāṁ caramabhavopagatānāmantaḥpuraparipācitāni  catvāri dharmamukhānyāmukhīkaroti sma | katamāni catvāri? yadidaṁ dānaṁ priyavacanamarthakriyāṁ samānārthatāṁ ca | catuḥsaṁgrahavastuprayoganirhāraviśuddhiṁ ca nāma dharmamukhamāmukhīkaroti sma | triratnavaṁśasādhāraṇābhiprāyo vipraṇāśasarvajñatācittapraṇidhānabalādhānāvaivartyaviṣayaṁ ca nāma dharmamukhamāmukhīkaroti sma | sarvasattvāparityāgādhyāśayamahākaruṇāvatāratāṁ ca nāma dharmamukhamāmukhīkaroti sma | sarvabodhipakṣadharmapade prabhedārthābhiniścayajñānasaṁsārabalaviśeṣasamudānayamahāvyūhaṁ ca nāma dharmamukhamāmukhīkaroti sma | imāni catvāri dharmamukhānyāmukhīkṛtya bodhisattvaḥ sarvasyāntaḥpurasya paripācanārthaṁ tasyāṁ velāyāṁ tathārūpamṛddhyabhisaṁskāramabhisaṁskaroti sma, yathārūpeṇa ṛddhyabhisaṁskāreṇābhisaṁskṛtena tebhyaḥ saṁgītirutebhyo bodhisattvānubhāvenemānyevaṁrūpāṇi dharmamukhaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma | tadyathā—
lal13:301: udārachandena ca āśayena adhyāśayenā karuṇāya prāṇiṣu |
lal13:302: utpadyate cittu varāgrabodhaye śabde ca rūpasturiyebhi niścarī ||
lal13:303: śraddhā prasādo adhimukti gauravaṁ nirmānatā onamanā gurūṇām |
lal13:305: dāne dabhe saṁyamaśīlaśabdaḥ kṣāntīya śabdastatha vīryaśabdaḥ |
lal13:306: dhyānābhinirhārasamādhiśabdaḥ prajñā upāyasya ca śabda niścarī ||
lal13:307: maitrāya śabdaḥ karuṇāya śabdo muditāupekṣāya abhijñaśabdaḥ |
lal13:316: yaṁ śrutva sarvā pramadā nu śikṣitā varāgrasattve praṇidhenti bodhaye ||
lal13:317: iti hi bhikṣavo antaḥpuramadhyagatena bodhisattvena tāni caturaśītistrīsahasrāṇi paripācitānyabhūvan anuttarāyāṁ samyaksaṁbodhau bahūni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi ye tatra saṁprāptā abhūvan ||
lal13:318: tathā abhiniṣkramaṇakāle tasmin samaye bodhisattvasya hrīdevo nāma tuṣitakāyiko devaputro ’nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṁbodheḥ sa rātrau praśāntāyāṁ dvātriṁśatā devaputrasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhisattvasyopasthānaprāsādastenopasaṁkrāmat |
lal13:320: cyuti darśitā atiyaśā janma ca saṁdarśitaṁ puruṣasiṁha |
lal13:322: paripācitā ti bahavo deva manuja loki dharmamanuprāpya |
lal13:324: na hi baddha mocayātī na cāndhapuruṣena darśiyati mārgaḥ |
lal13:326: ye sattva kāmadāsā gṛhe dhane putrabhāryapariśraddhāḥ |
lal13:327: te tubhya śiṣyamāṇā naiṣkramyamatau spṛhāṁ kuryuḥ ||
lal13:328: aiśvarya kāmakrīḍā catudvīpā sapta ratna vijahitvā |
lal13:330: kiṁ cāpi dhyānasaukhyairviharasi dharmairna cāsi kāmarataḥ |
lal13:337: te tṛpta yeṣa prajñā āryā lokottarā virajā ||
lal13:338: tvamiha priyo manāpo rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya rāṣṭrasya |
lal13:348: drakṣyati ca bhujagarājo bhavanaṁ avabhāsitaṁ tava śirīye |
lal13:356: satyaṁ hi bodhisattvā antaḥpuriye kriyā vidarśenti |
lal13:357: pūrvaṁgamo bhava tvaṁ mā bheṣyasi paścimasteṣām ||
